code: import React from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./index.scss';import Home from'../pages/home';import Practice from'../pages/practice';import Book from'../pages/book';import BookDetail from'../pages/bookDetail';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var AppRouter=function AppRouter(){var routeConfig=[{title:'首页',path:'/',exact:true,component:Home},{title:'练习',path:'/practice',exact:true,component:Practice},{title:'书籍列表',path:'/book',exact:true,component:Book},{title:'书籍详情',path:'/bookDetail',exact:true,component:BookDetail}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"layout",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sideBar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:routeConfig.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:item.path,children:item.title})},index);})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header",children:"\u5934\u90E8"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-content",children:routeConfig.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:item.path,exact:item.exact,component:item.component},index);})})]})]})});};export default AppRouter;
